entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
